svg.source: User->Gogs: pushes code Gogs-->Jenkins: sends webhook Gogs->Jenkins: clones repo Note over Jenkins: builds artifact,\nruns tests,\nanalyzes code Jenkins->SonarQube: uploads analysis Jenkins->Artifactory: uploads artifact Jenkins-->SIT: triggers deploy recipe Chef Server-->SIT: pulls deploy recipe Artifactory->SIT: downloads artifact Note over SIT: deploys app Jenkins->SIT: runs SoapUI functional tests Jenkins-->UAT: triggers deploy recipe Chef Server-->UAT: pulls deploy recipe Artifactory->UAT: downloads artifact Note over UAT: deploys app Jenkins->UAT: runs SoapUI load tests Jenkins-->Production: triggers deploy recipe Chef Server-->Production: pulls deploy recipe Artifactory->Production: downloads artifact Note over Production: deploys app SIT->Prometheus: scrapes metrics UAT->Prometheus: scrapes metrics Production->Prometheus: scrapes metrics Prometheus->Grafana: pulls and displays data Jenkins->User: views build logs SonarQube->User: views analysis reports SIT->User: accesses app UAT->User: accesses app Production->User: accesses app Grafana->User: views data
